revised_title: The Remarkable Life of Henry Jenkins: A Case Study in Longevity
tldr: This article presents the case of Henry Jenkins, a man who lived to the age of 169 years, and examines the possible factors that contributed to his exceptional longevity. The author, Dr. Tancred Robinson, provides a detailed account of Jenkins' life, including his lifestyle, diet, and health, and suggests that further research into his circumstances could provide valuable insights into the science of longevity.
